verbs.description: [ARG0: soldiers] [V: guard] [ARG1: arlington tomb of the unknowns] [ARGM-LOC: in snow storm] u s army soldiers who guard the tomb of the unknown soldier at arlington national cemetery in virginia do not take cover in bad weather the elite troops known as tomb sentinels guard the tomb 24 arlington national cemetery mid atlantic storm 3rd us infantry regiment the old guard arlington united states army
